lines.text: You've heard of the Hatfields and the McCoys?
Well this is a fight between the Haskells and the McCorkles.
They're in the phones now! Listen to that!

[takes the receiver]
Oh yes, very beautiful string quartet.

[writing down a medical report]
Hears bugles in phone.

[singing]
You gotta get up, you gotta get up, you're in the army now!
Johnny plays the bugle, he knows the calls from A to Z. But he's always at his best when blowing reveille.
He toot-a-lee-toots you into your clothes.
And makes you rue the day that you were born. There's nothing any one can do. The captain has to make it too! So you gotta get up, you gotta get up!
